job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: This is a work from anywhere position, though, if you want to visit the office, you can, just north of DC. The BayTech Group, a boutique recruiting firm, is seeking a Lead Software Engineer for a growing organization developing Automation and AI Software in the US, based out of the DC area. We are looking for a Lead and a Senior SW Engineer to help drive design, architecture and development decisions on 4-8+ person development teams. Required and/or preferred: 1-3+ years of Lead Engineering experience, developing scalable web apps, focusing on Javascript, Node.js, Typescript, etc Ability and interest in contributing to design and architecture of custom software applications Desire to work on a team with quality development processes including Unit Testing and TDD Strength in NodeJS ideal, open to a polyglot AWS or GCP exposure a plus If you're interested in blank slate/greenfield software engineering and new products, please explore this position. The Software Engineers we've placed on this team like it for several reasons, including a ton of new development and work/life balance (not more than 40 hour weeks). About the BayTech Group: We are independent. We don't work as part of a global staffing firm and we only work on a limited number of preferred, attractive positions with reputable organizations. We aim for professionalism and we won't waste your time.
